trans-unit.source: The ExtendedProtectionPolicyTypeConverter class represents the type converter for extended protection policy used by the server to validate incoming client connections.
trans-unit.target: A classe de ExtendedProtectionPolicyTypeConverter representa o conversor de tipos de política de protecção expandida utilizada pelo servidor para validar as ligações de cliente recebidos.

trans-unit.source: The ExtendedProtectionPolicyTypeConverter class is primarily used internally for XAML serialization of <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> objects, and does not normally need to be used directly by most applications.
trans-unit.target: A classe de ExtendedProtectionPolicyTypeConverter principalmente é utilizada internamente para a serialização de XAML de <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>objetos e, normalmente, têm de ser utilizados diretamente pela maioria das aplicações.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicyTypeConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicyTypeConverter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this converter can convert the object to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Devolve se este conversor pode converter o objeto para o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a converter.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you want to convert to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>que representa o tipo de que pretende converter.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este conversor pode efetuar a conversão; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Convert the object to the specified type
trans-unit.target: Converter o objeto para o tipo especificado

trans-unit.source: Use the `context` parameter to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o `context` parâmetro para extrair informações adicionais sobre o ambiente a partir do qual é invocado este conversor.

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be `null`, so always check it.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro pode ser `null`, sempre a verificar.

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the `context` object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, as propriedades de `context` objeto pode devolver `null`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is passed, the current culture is assumed.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> é transmitida atual é assumida cultura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>converter.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: This should be a <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Deve ser um <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to convert the value parameter to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>para converter o parâmetro de valor para.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An that represents the converted value parameter.
trans-unit.target: Um que representa o convertida value parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The destinationType parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The destinationType parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The conversion could not be performed.
trans-unit.target: Não foi possível efetuar a conversão.
